about_the_game:
Become a couple of futanari and have lovey-dovey, healing time

Enjoy yourself in a love hotel as a couple of futanari.
Use adult toys on your partner or yourself.
Each location has several scenes that you can switch between.

Online only, room separated by glass

Online mode is included in the demo version of the game.
Each enters a room separated by glass.
You cannot make contact with each other and can only show each other your masturbation.
Use the monitor to make masturbation tools appear in the room.

Online Play

Regardless of gender, age, or nationality. There are no usernames, so anyone can easily get started.
It is buy-in and there is no usage fee.
You can easily stimulate your partner by using the vibrations of the VR controller and the electric toys.
You can easily stimulate your partner.
( The electric toy function is currently for PC only and has been tested on A10 Cyclone SA)

You can access the game online by launching the game and using the phone in your room.
Enjoy casual sex with your matches.

There is no voice function online, so there is no need for vocal communication.
Instead, there is a simple conversation system.
Even if you are of different nationalities, you will be shown in the language you have set.

By changing the hand mode setting, your hand gesture movements are transmitted to the other person's interlocking function, and the other person's hand gesture movements are transmitted to the other person's interlocking function.
You can stimulate each other and experience pseudo-sex.
[Hand mode]
AutoMove - Automatically stimulates the partner, adjustable to 4 levels.
HandMove - Automatically adjusts the stimulation to 4 levels according to the speed of the controller's swing.
HandMoveDirect - Converts the swinging motion of the controller directly into stimulation

Even outside of sex scenes, you can stimulate your partner by using toys in the room or giving him a blowjob.
You can also stimulate your partner by using toys in the room or giving him a blowjob.

Single Play

* 23 scenes in addition to free H.

* Various facilities are available in the love hotel where the game takes place.
　You can choose from 9 types of lighting and 3 types of music.
　Monitors in the bedroom and bath allow you to enjoy slideshows.
　A large mirror is placed and can be moved to any place at any time.

* VR controller operation linkage
When the hand mode is changed, the girl also moves in conjunction with the controller's shaking motion.

* VR controller vibration function
Vibrates in accordance with the girl's movement.

* Support for electric masturbation hole
The girl moves in conjunction with the girl's movement and the movement of the controller.
Operation has been confirmed with A10 Cyclone SA.
( This function is currently for PC only. Operation has been confirmed with A10 Cyclone SA. )



* Can make the partner take a free pose.

* Can use a dildo or masturbator for you or your partner, or kiss them



During the scene where you rub each other, set the animation mode to hand mode and shake the controller.
You can play as if you are supposed to be doing it yourself in real life, but in VR it is as if you are doing it with your partner.

How to operate.

* Normal operation
"Analog stick" Move
"Analog stick + Trigger key" Turn, up/down
"Trigger key" Use
"Grip Keys" Hold
"Tap 1, 2, 3, 4 button" Menu (current)
"1, 2, 3, 4 button hold" Menu (Main)

* Mirror Move
"Analog stick" Move
"Analog stick + Trigger key" Rotate
"Analog stick + Trigger key + Grip key" Up/Down

This software has been developed and tested with MetaQuest2 (Oculus Link) and HTC VIVE.
　Operation may differ on other VR devices.

About the operation.

* PCVR
Meta Quest 2(OculusLink) Operation confirmed on actual device
HtcVive Operation confirmed on actual device

We have not confirmed the operation in other environments.
We hope you will check it by playing the Demo version.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains depictions of consensual sexual activity between two adults with male and female genitalia

name: Just Futanari

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: MetaQuest2(OculusLink) HtcVive

short_description: Exclusively for VR Become a futanari couple and make out, healing time!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
